actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to extend to certain Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel who were reemployed annuitants on July 12, 1974, the benefits provided to other Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel under the Act of July 12, 1974.

summary.text: Entitles retired Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel who were rehired and serving as law enforcement officers or firefighters on July 12, 1974 to have their annuities recomputed in accordance with the annuity benefits provided for retired firefighter and law enforcement personnel by the Act of Congress on such date.

titles.title: A bill to extend to certain Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel who were reemployed annuitants on July 12, 1974, the benefits provided to other Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel under the Act of July 12, 1974.
